info.name: Toll System API
info.description: API for man aging toll stations, passes, and related operations

item.name: Authenticate user and get JWT token

request.description: Revokes the current user's authentication token.

request.description: It receives a username and a password as input and creates the user or modifies the already existing user

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Get a list of all users

request.description: Retrieves a list of usernames for all users in the system.

response.name: Successful response with a list of usernames.

item.name: Get passes through a specific toll station for a given time period

request.description: Returns detailed information about passes through a specific toll station, including pass details and vehicle tags

item.name: Get pass analysis for a station operator and tag operator
Get charges by operator for a specific period

request.description: Returns the charges and number of passes for each visiting operator at the specified operator's toll stations
It performs a transaction between two operators. The paying Operator pays the Receiving Operator the specifid amount.

item.name: Get debts owed to an operator

request.description: It displays all debts owed to the requested operator.

item.name: Calculate the cost of passes for a given period

query.description: The desired format of the response (JSON or CSV).

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Toll Operator.
(Required) The ID of the Tag Operator.
(Required) The start date of the period in YYYYMMDD format.
(Required) The end date of the period in YYYYMMDD format.

request.description: Calculates the total number of passes and their cost for a specific Toll Operator (tollOpID) and Tag Operator (tagOpID) within a date range (date_from to date_to).

response.name: Successful response with the calculated cost and number of passes.
